entry.title: Working in the cloud
entry.summary:
During the last few month, I've been working almost exclusively on a remote server, as my main environnement. This machine is shared between several people (a small team of 6 people). Before that, I used to code, run programs, do stuff on my local machine, now, everything is done on a remote server. In this post I would like to give feedback about this way of working, why I wanted to tried this, what changed in the way a I work, what was bad, good, different, etc. I would like to emphasis that this is not a why-you-should-do-it-kind of post, instead, I would be glad to know what you think about it, and what was your own experience, in case you also tried remote working.
